q1.title: Market Penetration
q1.description: Increase market share with current products in existing markets through competitive pricing and marketing.

q2.title: Product Development
q2.description: Create new products for existing customer base leveraging current market knowledge and relationships.

q3.title: Market Development
q3.description: Expand into new geographical markets or customer segments with existing products.

q4.title: Diversification
q4.description: Enter new markets with new products requiring significant investment and strategic capabilities.
